gw.plugin.exchangerate

Interface IExchangeRateSetPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IExchangeRateSetPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Plugin to create an ExchangeRateSet based on exchange rates pulled from an external source.
    Author:
    chsu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExchangeRateSet createExchangeRateSet()
      Creates and returns an ExchangeRateSet.

    • Method Detail

      • createExchangeRateSet

        ExchangeRateSet createExchangeRateSet()
        Creates and returns an ExchangeRateSet. An implementation will typically pull at minimum n-1 exchange rates from an external source (where n is the number of configured currencies in the system), one for each {reporting currency, non-reporting currency} ordered pair, and create ExchangeRates from them. These are added to a new ExchangeRateSet. Upon commit, the ExchangeRateSet will be populated for the remaining ExchangeRates that were not specified. Optionally, the implementation may choose to provide more ExchangeRates than the required minimum, if a specific exchange rate for a specific currency ordered pair is desired.
        Returns:
        the newly created ExchangeRateSet
